name: Dotation Jeunes Agriculteurs – Franche-Comté
description: The project described is an agricultural support program called "Dotation Jeunes Agriculteurs" in the region of Franche-Comté. It aims to facilitate the installation of young farmers under the age of 40 who wish to become farm managers for the first time. The program provides financial assistance in the form of a capital grant to help start their agricultural activities. The program is co-financed by the Bourgogne-Franche-Comté Region. Applicants must submit a complete application including a business plan, installation request, regional annex, and supporting documents. The project also includes a final business plan evaluation to validate the completion of the plan and final payment of the grant. For further information and to apply, applicants can contact the regional agriculture and forestry department.
requirements:
- The project aims to support young farmers aged under 40 who wish to establish themselves as farm managers for the first time.
- The project provides a financial grant called the "Dotation jeune agriculteur" (DJA) to assist with the start-up of agricultural activities.
- The DJA is co-financed by the Bourgogne-Franche-Comté region.
- Applications must be submitted to the agriculture and forestry department of the regional council.
- Only complete applications will be considered, including a business plan, installation assistance request, regional annex to the assistance request, and all required general documents.
- A final control of the business plan is required to validate its implementation and receive the remaining payment of the DJA grant.
- The application for the final payment of the DJA grant must be made after the completion of the business plan.
- Applicants can seek assistance from agricultural chambers for guidance in the process.
- Contact information for the regional council's agriculture and forestry department is provided.
- Various documents are available for the final payment request of the DJA grant.
- The regional council provides a newsletter for the latest information and offers social media accounts for further updates.
contact:
Contact:
Conseil régional de Bourgogne-Franche-Comté – Direction de l’agriculture et de la forêt
Adresse: 4 square Castan, CS 51 857, 25031 Besançon Cedex
Email: contact.agriculture@bourgognefranchecomte.fr
Tél: (+33) 3 81 61 61 61

name: Dotation Jeunes Agriculteurs – Bourgogne
description: L'appel à projets vise à soutenir l'installation en agriculture des jeunes agriculteurs en Bourgogne. Les candidats éligibles doivent être âgés de moins de 40 ans et souhaiter s'installer pour la première fois en tant que chef d'exploitation agricole. Le dispositif consiste en une dotation en capital pour le démarrage de l'activité agricole. Les dossiers complets doivent être envoyés à la direction de l'Agriculture et de la Forêt du Conseil régional de Bourgogne-Franche-Comté. Un contrôle de fin de plan d'entreprise est également nécessaire pour obtenir le paiement du solde de la dotation. Des documents supplémentaires et des contacts sont disponibles pour accompagner les agriculteurs dans leur démarche.
requirements:
1. The project aims to support young farmers under the age of 40 who want to become agricultural business owners.

2. The Dotation Jeune Agriculteur (DJA) provides capital for the start-up of their farming activities.

3. The project is co-financed by the Bourgogne-Franche-Comté region.

4. Complete applications must be submitted to the Agriculture and Forestry Department of the Regional Council of Bourgogne-Franche-Comté.

5. The application should include the candidate's business plan, request for installation aid, regional annex to the installation aid request, and all required general documents (except for the bank statement, which is not required initially but must be provided before the application is presented to the regional programming committee).

6. The application must also include evidence of the selected adjustments listed in the regional annex.

7. A control of the final business plan and a payment request for the remaining DJA funds must be submitted after the implementation of the business plan. This control verifies the compliance of the plan and allows for the payment of the remaining funds.

8. Young farmers who have applied for installation aid since January 1, 2015, are eligible for the control and payment request.

9. Applicants are encouraged to seek assistance from their agricultural chambers throughout the process.

10. Contact information for the Agriculture and Forestry Department of the Regional Council of Bourgogne-Franche-Comté is provided.

11. Additional resources and documents related to the project are available for download.

12. The Regional Council of Bourgogne-Franche-Comté's contact information is provided.

13. The project is open for applications from November 4, 2022, to October 17, 2023.

14. The project is ongoing and is part of a continuous call for proposals.

15. The project aims to ensure the renewal of generations in agriculture through supporting new farmers.
contact:
Conseil régional de Bourgogne-Franche-Comté – Direction de l’agriculture et de la forêt, site de Besançon
4 square Castan
CS 51 857
25031 BESANCON Cedex
contact.agriculture@bourgognefranchecomte.fr

name: Accompagnement des transitions agroécologiques des productions végétales.
description: L'appel à projets vise à encourager l'investissement dans les matériels permettant une gestion efficiente des ressources agricoles et une réduction de l'impact environnemental des pratiques. Les projets éligibles incluent l'achat de matériel cultural, la plantation de haies, la création d'aires de lavage de pulvérisateurs et la protection contre le gel et la grêle. Les bénéficiaires peuvent être des agriculteurs, des groupements d'agriculteurs, des structures publiques ou des associations actives dans le domaine agricole. Les modalités de dépôt des projets sont disponibles en ligne, avec la possibilité de soumettre une déclaration d'intention de dépôt ou de déposer directement le dossier de demande d'aide en ligne.
requirements:
- The project must encourage investment in equipment that promotes efficient resource management in agriculture.
- The equipment can be related to preserving resources, planting hedges, constructing sprayer wash areas, protecting against frost and hail, etc.
- The beneficiaries of the project can be individual or corporate farmers, agricultural groups, public agricultural organizations, or agricultural associations.
- The project must comply with the conditions stated in the regulatory document.
- There are two options for submitting the project: submitting an online declaration of intent for quick investment or submitting the complete online application later.
- The project must be submitted through the EURO-PAC platform, which is dedicated to online submission and processing of applications.
- Additional information about the new funding program and submission procedures can be found in the provided notice.
- Contact information for inquiries about the project is provided.
- The region is Bourgogne-Franche-Comté, and the contact details for the regional council are provided.

name: Modernisation et adaptation des exploitations d’élevage au dérèglement climatique.
description: The project aims to support livestock farms in adapting to climate change, preserving the environment, and enhancing their competitiveness. It focuses on funding for the construction, expansion, renovation, and equipment acquisition related to livestock activities. The beneficiaries include farmers, agricultural groups, public agricultural structures, and agricultural associations. The program also mentions a new online platform, EURO-PAC, for project submission and processing, offering two options for project submission.
requirements:
- Accompany the transitions of livestock farms towards adaptation to climate change, environmental preservation, and strengthening competitiveness.
- Projects eligible for funding include the construction, expansion, renovation, and improvement of buildings, as well as the acquisition of equipment related to livestock farming.
- There are three options for project submission: "buildings, animal welfare, and adaptation to climate change"; "effluents"; and "energy performance of livestock farms".
- Eligible beneficiaries include farmers, agricultural groups, public agricultural organizations, and agricultural associations.
- Starting in 2023, there will be a new program for European agricultural funds, and a dedicated online platform called EURO-PAC will be used for project submission and processing.
- There are two options for project submission: a simplified online declaration of intent for those ready to invest quickly, or a full online application through EURO-PAC for those who need more time.
- The project must comply with the conditions stated in the decree.
- For more information on the submission process, refer to the provided notice.
- Contact information for inquiries is available.
- Resources such as the decree and tutorials on EURO-PAC are provided.
- The website also provides links to the regional council's social media accounts and newsletter subscription.
contact:
Contact Modernisation et Adaptation des exploitations d’élevage
Email: feader.investissement@bourgognefranchecomte.fr

name: Investissements pour la diversification des activités et des productions agricoles.
description: The project aims to promote the diversification of agricultural activities and productions in order to enhance the sustainability, competitiveness, and income of farms. This diversification will contribute to the self-sufficiency of territories by promoting the development of short circuits.
requirements:
- Favoriser la diversification des productions et des activités agricoles
- Renforcer la pérennisation, la compétitivité et le revenu des exploitations agricoles
- Contribuer à l’autosuffisance alimentaire des territoires
- Favoriser l’émergence des circuits courts
- Soutenir les projets de transformation, de conservation, de conditionnement et/ou de commercialisation des produits agricoles
- Soutenir la diversification des productions agricoles en région
- Soutenir la construction, la rénovation, l’extension de bâtiments agricoles
- Soutenir l’acquisition d’équipements et de matériels agricoles
- Soutenir l’achat et la plantation de végétaux pour les cultures pérennes
contact:
Contact Diversification des activités agricoles
Email: feader.diversification@bourgognefranchecomte.fr
